schemaName.title: schemaName
schemaName.description: This is the name of the file format (i.e. spectroData)

schemaVersion.title: schemaVersion
schemaVersion.description: This is the version of the fileformat

schemaURL.title: schemaURL
schemaURL.description: URL that points to the description of the schema

id.title: id
id.description: unique identifier of the dataset (GUID, UUID,...)

dataType.title: type of the data set
dataType.description: type of data set: rawSRM is raw data (typically expressed in counts versus pixel positition) of the SRM, evaluatedSRM would be evaluated data generated by the SRM software

id.title: id
id.description: id of the related data set

title.title: title
title.description: title of the related data set

relationType.title: relationType
relationType.description: relation towards a related data set

deviceSRM.title: deviceSRM
deviceSRM.description: This is to describe the spectroradiometer device

id.title: id
id.description: ID of the device, could be an UUID, GUID

name.title: name
name.description: This is the name of the device

type.title: type
type.description: This is the device type as defined by the manufactuer

description.title: description
description.description: can be used for further description of the device

inventoryNumber.title: inventoryNumber
inventoryNumber.description: Inventory Number as typically defined by user/owner

referencePlaneSRM.title: referencePlaneSRM
referencePlaneSRM.description: decription of the position of the reference plane of the SRM

azimuthZeroSRM.title: azimuthZeroSRM
azimuthZeroSRM.description: decription of the plane that defines azimuth=0° of the SRM

SRMType.title: SRMType
SRMType.description: The this is the kind of SRM in respect to the configuration

xScaleQuantity.title: xScaleQuantity
xScaleQuantity.description: defines the quantity of the xScale

xScaleUnit.title: xScaleUnit
xScaleUnit.description: Unit associated with the Xscale quantity (nm, Hz, s-1,)

xScaleRangeMin.title: xScaleRangeMin
xScaleRangeMin.description: Minimum wavelength range of the SRM

xScaleRangeMax.title: xScaleRangeMax
xScaleRangeMax.description: Maximum wavelength range of the SRM

xScaleInterval.title: xScaleInterval
xScaleInterval.description: wavelengthInterval. put value is 0 or negative if the interval is varying

spectralUnit.title: spectralUnit
spectralUnit.description: spectral Unit associated with the quantity (W nm-1, mW m-2 nm-1, eV,...)

scans.title: scans
scans.description: defines the number of scans that where used to calculated the average value

configurationFile.title: configurationFile
configurationFile.description: name (and event. path) of the configuration File

opticalBandwidth.title: opticalBandwidth
opticalBandwidth.description: average optical bandwidth expressed in the XScaleUnit

inputOptics.title: inputOptics
inputOptics.description: input optics used for the devices

temperatureDevice1.title: temperatureDevice1
temperatureDevice1.description: temperature of the device at point 1, expressed in °C

temperatureDevice2.title: temperatureDevice2
temperatureDevice2.description: temperature of the device at point 2, expressed in °C

postProcessing.title: postProcessing
postProcessing.description: This is to describe postProcessing of the Data

softwareName.title: softwareName
softwareName.description: name of the software used for the postprocessing

softwareVersion.title: softwareVersion
softwareVersion.description: version of the software used for postprocessing

softwareURL.title: softwareURL
softwareURL.description: URL of the software used for postprocessing

assignment.title: assignment
assignment.description: Information about the assignment of the measurement data

taskName.title: taskName
taskName.description: name of the task within a project or a mandate

taskID.title: taskID
taskID.description: ID of the task within a project or a mandate

comment.title: comment
comment.description: any comment that could be useful

ambientTemperature.title: ambientTemperature
ambientTemperature.description: ambient temperature during measurement, expressed in °C

ambientRelHumidity.title: ambientRelHumidity
ambientRelHumidity.description: relative ambient humidity during measurement, expressed in %

measurementDistance.title: measurementDistance
measurementDistance.description: measurement distance between reference plane of the device under test and the detector, expressed in m

angleIncdientSRM.title: angleIncdientSRM
angleIncdientSRM.description: incidence angle of the optical radiation on the SRM (normal incidence = 0°), expressed in degree

angleAzimthSRM.title: angleAzimthSRM
angleAzimthSRM.description: azimuth angle of the optical radiation on the SRM, expressed in degree

angleEmittingSource.title: angleEmittingSource
angleEmittingSource.description: emission angle of the optical radiation emitted by the source (normal incidence = 0°), expressed in degree

angleAzimthSource.title: angleAzimthSource
angleAzimthSource.description: azimuth angle of the optical radiation emitted by the source, expressed in degree

deviceSource.title: deviceSource
deviceSource.description: Information about the source (device under test) that is measured

name.title: name
name.description: name of the source (lampe, sample, etc)

type.title: type
type.description: This is the type as defined by the manufactuer

description.title: description
description.description: can be used for further description of the source

inventoryNumber.title: inventoryNumber
inventoryNumber.description: Inventory Number as typically defined by user/owner

referencePlaneSource.title: referencePlaneSource
referencePlaneSource.description: decription of the position of the reference plane/point of the source

azimuthZeroSource.title: AzimuthZeroSource
azimuthZeroSource.description: decription of the plane that defines azimuth=0° of the source

current.title: current
current.description: electrical current expressed in A of the device under test

current.title: voltage
current.description: electrical voltage expressed in V of the device under test

power.title: power
power.description: electrical power expressed in W of the device under test

frequency.title: frequency
frequency.description: frequency expressed in Hz of the power supply of the device under test

cosPhi.title: cosPhi
cosPhi.description: fcosPhi of the power supply of the device under test

powerMode.title: powerMode
powerMode.description: current mode of the power supply of the device under test

nominalMode.title: nominalMode
nominalMode.description: nominal mode of the power supply of the device under test

temperatureDevice1.title: temperatureDevice1
temperatureDevice1.description: temperature of the device at point 1, expressed in °C

temperatureDevice2.title: temperatureDevice2
temperatureDevice2.description: temperature of the device at point 2, expressed in °C

measurementFileName.title: measurementFileName
measurementFileName.description: orginal filename generated by the device software

measurementFileType.title: measurementFileType
measurementFileType.description: filetype of the orginal filename generated by the device software

measurementFileHeader.title: measurementFileHeader
measurementFileHeader.description: header of the orginal filename generated by the device software

dateTimeISO.title: dateTimeISO
dateTimeISO.description: date and time of the measurement expressed accoring ISO

xScaleValue.title: xScaleValue
xScaleValue.description: xScaleValue of the data (i.e. wavelenth value)

StdDev.title: StdDev
StdDev.description: standard deviation of the average value if severals scans were made

Unc.title: Unc
Unc.description: Expanded absolute uncertainty (about 95% confidence interval, k=2)
